Package com.csse3200.game.components

Class GeneratorStatsComponent

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.components.CombatStatsComponent
com.csse3200.game.components.GeneratorStatsComponent
public class GeneratorStatsComponent extends CombatStatsComponent
A component to store and manage the statistics of a generator unit.

This includes values such as how frequently the generator produces scrap, how much scrap it generates per cycle, and how much it costs to place the generator.

It extends CombatStatsComponent but disables attack by setting the attack stat to 0.

      scrapValue - the value of the scrap generated
